automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Searches for matches in session/packet content

automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Performs a query against the meta database
automation.name: NetwitnessQuery

commands.description: Search for pattern matches in many sessions or packets
commands.name: netwitness-msearch

commands.description: Searches for matches in session/packet content
commands.name: netwitness-search

commands.description: Performs a query against the meta database
commands.name: netwitness-query

commands.description: Stream packets back based on the input parameters provided
commands.name: netwitness-packets

commands.description: Retrieves the meta id range for the session range
commands.name: nw-sdk-session

commands.description: Returns the packet content for a session
commands.name: nw-sdk-content

commands.description: Retrieves summary information from the databases
commands.name: nw-sdk-summary

commands.description: Performs a value count query and returns the matching values for a report
commands.name: nw-sdk-values

commands.description: Dumps information out of the database in nwd formatted files
commands.name: nw-database-dump

integration.description: RSA NetWitness Logs and Packets decoders are responsible for the real-time collection of network data. The decode captures data in real time and can normalize and reconstruct data for full session analysis. In addition, the decoder can collect flow and endpoint data.
integration.name: RSA NetWitness Packets and Logs

description: RSA NetWitness Logs and Packets decoders are responsible for the real-time collection of network data. The decode captures data in real time and can normalize and reconstruct data for full session analysis. In addition, the decoder can collect flow and endpoint data.
name: RSA NetWitness Packets and Logs
